name: Picbit
description:
Play a  junk collector who controls a swarm of robotic picbits. 

Very much a tech demo of a Pikmin-like game! Made during #SGDQ (July 2017) to learn Unity, keep my programming skills intact, and honor one of my favorite games. Will be a pretty barebones demo for some time as I focus on improving the gamefeel and mechanics before drawing more sprites and assets and creating a legitimate game mode (either random single player dungeons or a battle mode)

NOTE: Xbox controller preferred, Keyboard controls included for debug.
Right Stick - Move
Left Stick - Rally Picbits
Bumpers - Rotate Camera
A - Throw Picbit
B - Call Picbits
X - Release Picbits
Y - Spawn Picbit *Debug Command
